name: List Item
content:
# List Item

This tag is used to create a list. The list tag `<li>` must be contained in an ordered list (`<ol>` with bullets) or an unordered list (`<ul>` with numbers).
short_description:
List Item
This tag is used to create a list. The list tag <li> must be contained in an ordered list (<ol> with bullets) or an unordered list (<ul> with numbers).
tips:
* Try to indent your `` tags so it's clear they are contained in the `
    ` or `
      ` tags. * Make sure to start your list with either a `
        ` or a `
          `. If you just use `
        1. ` without `
            ` or `
              ` the rendered result will be a unordered list with bullet icons preceding each list item. * The list items can contain content other than text such as lists of videos, images, songs, or hyperlinks.
